text: he nabee! kah do ki yadi tumhaare baap, tumhaare putr, tumhaare bhaee, tumhaaree patniyaan, tumhaare parivaar, tumhaara dhan jo tumane kamaaya hai aur jis vyapaar ke mand ho jaane ka tumhen bhay hai tatha vo ghar jinase moh rakhate ho, tumhen allaah tatha usake rasool aur allaah kee raah mein jihaad karane se adhik priy hain, to prateeksha karo, yahaan tak ki allaah ka nirnay aa jaaye aur allaah ullanghanakaariyon ko supath nahin dikhaata
